alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 9:01PM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Greene, Perry and George Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain...Minor flooding is forecast. ...The Flood Warning remains in effect... The Flood Warning continues for the Leaf Near Mclain. * Until further notice. * At 8:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 20.9 feet. * Flood stage is 18 feet. * Minor flooding is occurring. * Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.5 feet Monday evening. * Impact...At 18 feet, considerable flooding of agricultural and lowlands near the river. At 24 feet, some county roads in the area will become flooded. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
